original_text: And the priest shall look, and if it appears deeper than the skin and its hair has turned white, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean. It is a case of leprous disease that has broken out in the boil.
korean_text: 그는 진찰하여 피부보다 얕고 그 털이 희면 그를 부정하다 할지니 이는 종기로 된 나병의 환부임이니라

sentences.original_text: and if it appears deeper than the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그것이 피부보다 더 깊어 보이고

sentences.original_text: and its hair has turned white,
then the priest shall pronounce him unclean.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 그를 부정하다고 선언할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It is a case of leprous disease
that has broken out in the boil.
